Projects

Personal projects

  • Wave-PD1 - An experimental synthesizer built using the Web Audio API.
  • Shake.js - A custom 'shake' event plugin for mobile web browsers using device accelerometer.
  • Tap.js - A custom 'tap' event JavaScript plugin for mobile and tablet browsers.
  • Checklist - a mobile web app for creating quick to-do lists, built with Backbone.js

You can find more of my project work over on GitHub.

Client work

  • Threepress Consulting Inc - Research & consultation on mobile browser support for HTML5 API's.
  • NoString Networks Ltd - Blackberry Playbook app development.
  • eduPad - Consultation on CSS animation work.
